name: Whack a Zombie Mole
description:
Atari 2600 stylized whack a mole type game with a political zombie twist. 

Click zombies, avoid woman. That's all. 

Play & save your best score in the HALL OF FAME. 

This is my first ever finished game written in React (TypeScript). 

It's totally free and open-sourced, so you can download its code at GitHub.
